trans-unit.source: Specifies the constraints of a property in a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir begrensningene for en egenskap i en <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The StylusPointPropertyInfo class inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty> class and generates the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo.Maximum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo.Resolution%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo.Unit%2A> values used to define the properties of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.
trans-unit.target: StylusPointPropertyInfo klassen arver fra den <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty>klasse og genererer den <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo.Maximum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo.Resolution%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo.Unit%2A>verdiene som brukes til å definere egenskaper for en <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo.Unit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo.Resolution%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty>

trans-unit.source: The validity of each property value varies depending on the manufacture of the digitizer and stylus.
trans-unit.target: Gyldigheten av hver egenskapsverdi varierer avhengig av produksjon av digitaliseringsenhet og stylus.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> to base the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> on.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref> som grunnlag for den nye <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref> på.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> class using the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av de angitte verdiene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> to base the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> on.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref> som grunnlag for den nye <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref> på.

trans-unit.source: The minimum value accepted for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: Minimumsverdien godtatt for den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The maximum value accepted for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: Maksimumsverdien godtatt for den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyUnit"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyUnit"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The scale that converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> property value into its units.
trans-unit.target: Skalaen som konverterer en <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> egenskapsverdien til dens enheter.

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum value accepted for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter den maksimale verdien som er godkjent den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The maximum value accepted for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: Maksimumsverdien godtatt for den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum value accepted for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter den laveste verdien som er godkjent den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The minimum value accepted for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: Minimumsverdien godtatt for den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the scale that converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> property value into units.
trans-unit.target: Henter skalaen som konverterer en <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> egenskapsverdien til enheter.

trans-unit.source: Multiply the resolution by the value of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> property to get its unit-based value.
trans-unit.target: Multipliserer løsningen med verdien for en <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>til å hente verdien basert på enheten.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a property's value is 100, the unit is inches, and the resolution is .01, then multiplying 100 by .01 reveals that the value of that property is 1 inch.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis en egenskapsverdien er 100 enhet er cm og løsningen er, 01, viser å multiplisere 100 av.01 verdien for denne egenskapen er 1 tomme.

trans-unit.source: The scale that converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> property value into units.
trans-unit.target: Skalaen som konverterer en <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> egenskapsverdien til enheter.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of measurement that is used by <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter målenheten som brukes av <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyUnit"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyUnit"> </xref> verdier.
